info.title: Funds Transfer Provider APIs
info.description: These APIs are used to create and get FundsTransfer records.

post.description: Used to create an unauthorized Funds Transfer record.To authorize, please use updatePaymentTransfer API
Used to create an unauthorized SEPA Funds Transfer record.To authorize, please use updateSEPAPaymentTransfer API

get.description: Used to get the Funds Transfer record.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: Identifies uniquely each Funds Transfer transaction. 12 character standard id. Explanation of Reference Number format: FTYYDDDNNNNN where FT-Application indicator - FT for the Funds Transfer Application, YY-Last two digits of year when transaction is processed, DDD-Julian day number within year when the F.T. is processed, NNNNN-Sequence number.

put.description: Used to authorize a Funds Transfer record.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: Identifies uniquely each Funds Transfer transaction. 12 character standard id. Explanation of Reference Number format: FTYYDDDNNNNN where FT-Application indicator - FT for the Funds Transfer Application, YY-Last two digits of year when transaction is processed, DDD-Julian day number within year when the F.T. is processed, NNNNN-Sequence number.

get.description: Used to get SEPA Funds Transfer record.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: Identifies uniquely each Funds Transfer transaction. 12 character standard id. Explanation of Reference Number format: FTYYDDDNNNNN where FT-Application indicator - FT for the Funds Transfer Application, YY-Last two digits of year when transaction is processed, DDD-Julian day number within year when the F.T. is processed, NNNNN-Sequence number.

put.description: Used to authorize SEPA Funds Transfer record.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: Identifies uniquely each Funds Transfer transaction. 12 character standard id. Explanation of Reference Number format: FTYYDDDNNNNN where FT-Application indicator - FT for the Funds Transfer Application, YY-Last two digits of year when transaction is processed, DDD-Julian day number within year when the F.T. is processed, NNNNN-Sequence number.

tags: Get Funds Transfer History by Account
get.summary: Get Funds Transfer History by Account
get.description: Used to get the Funds Transfer records list of a particular account.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The field holds the reference of the underlying ACCOUNT application. This should just be the same as trying a new input on ACCOUNT application.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date from which records in response should be displayed.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date upto which records in response should be displayed.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: viewType
parameters.description: Indicates the summary or detail of account. S-Summary, D-Detail.

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record no from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Random and unique string for each page. Used for security purpose

get.description: Used to get the status of Funds Transfer record.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: Identifies uniquely each Funds Transfer transaction. 12 character standard id. Explanation of Reference Number format: FTYYDDDNNNNN where FT-Application indicator - FT for the Funds Transfer Application, YY-Last two digits of year when transaction is processed, DDD-Julian day number within year when the F.T. is processed, NNNNN-Sequence number.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record no from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Random and unique string for each page. Used for security purpose
